name: Ahriman's Treasure
description:
After having found a magical, flying carpet, you must flee the Temple of Ahriman as it collapses.Avoid obstacles and gather the rare treasure of Ahriman on the way.

How long can you survive? How much treasure can you collect?

Originally made for the Indie Speed Run 2013 with a theme of Rarity and the element Persian Rug.

Includes Game Jolt trophies and highscores.
